verses.roman:
ihā ba-i adhika āra kichu nā ānibā
adhika ānile āmā ethā nā dekhibā"

synonyms: ihā ba-i—except for this; adhika—more; āra—extra; kichu—anything; nā ānibā—do not bring; adhika ānile—if more is brought; āmā—Me; ethā—here; nā dekhibā—you will not see.
translation: "If you bring any more than this, you will not see Me here anymore."
